DOC.brief_summary: Reliability 3D angio QFR functional evaluation non culprit lesion > 50 % STEMI patient first acute procedure
DOC.brief_title: Non Culprit Functional Evaluation With 3D Angio QFR STEMI PCI Procedure
DOC.detailed_description: 3DAngio QFR angiographic base tool coronary stenosis functional assessment : validate versus Adenosine FFR ( ADOFFR ) several study ( FAVOR , VIRTU-1 ) ; particular post contrast QFR ( cQFR ) show good correlation ADOFFR . Furthermore ADOFFR non culprit vessel acute stage STEMI correlate well ADOFFR non culprit lesion stag procedure . Aim study find valid correlation cQFR acute study ADOFFR stag procedure . A positive result may lead fast , easy cost effective acute functional non culprit lesion evaluation acute procedure STEMI patient , select , , treat immediately staged procedure .
DOC.criteria: STEMI/NSTEMI pt least 1 non culprit lesion > 50 % Age > 18 year Able provide sign informed consent Angiographic inclusion criterion : Indication FFR least one stenosis : Diameter stenosis 50 % 90 % visual estimate Reference vessel size > 2 mm stenotic segment visual estimate Severe asthma severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease Severe heart failure ( NYHA≥III ) Screatinine > 150µmol/L GFR < 45 ml/kg/1.73m2 Allergy contrast medium adenosine Atrial fibrillation Angiographic exclusion criterion : poor coronary opacification mark overlap mark tortuosity angio acquisition protocol incomplete
